properties.title: Historical and Ethnological Museum SG
properties.abstract: In the Historical and Ethnological Museum of St.Gallen history and ethnology are united in one house.
properties.description: The collection of the Historical and Ethnological Museum covers objects from the ancient and early historical periods to the 20th century as well as numerous objects from various cultures of the world. Since April 2007, the building has its own children's museum. There are multiple changing exhibitions taking place every year.
properties.name: St.Gallen-Bodensee Tourismus
